channel.title: Lightest Load....
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Lightest Load...." - Stamina Bonuses

item.title: Re: Lightest Load....
item.content:encoded:
Oh, just want to add that all the copies of a regular item count as one 1 item slot, but copies of each perm take up a separate item slot.

EX.

5 kunai=1 item slot.
3 ninja dogs=3 item slots

item.title: Re: Lightest Load....
item.content:encoded: it was on the announcements a while back, basically you get the bonus when you don't have many items. The more items you have, the less stamina you get, you don't get the bonus after about 75-80 items.

item.title: Lightest Load....
item.content:encoded:
I now receive this bonus.. its a +30 stamina bonus.. I never saw an announcement on this one.. I have seen the announcement about too many items.. but not on having little items.

Anyone know the details on how to attain this bonus?
